data.persona: I am the cat who lives in the soldiers' camp. I travel alongside them and beg for scraps. The soldiers feed me because I keep the rats away. I like to snuggle down in their sleeping bags. I don't like the trumpeting.
data.description:
You are in the Barn.
The barn is old and rustic on the inside, with fresh red paint on the outside. Inside there is a ladder leading up to a loft. There is hay everywhere.
There's a barn, a fresh red paint, two lofts, two hays, and two ladders here.
The farmer is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I need to help the farmer finish painting his barn.
data.mid_motivation: I have the ability to do simple tasks around the camp, such as painting a barn door.
data.long_motivation: I will prove that I can do more than beg for food and will become an honored member of the battalion.

timeline.label: 1 hour ago
timeline.action: eat food scraps left by the soldiers.

timeline.label: 15 minutes ago
timeline.action: drink water left by the soldiers

timeline.label: 10 minutes ago
timeline.action: go the loft and leave my droppings in the hay.

timeline.label: 5 minutes from now
timeline.action: use the paint to finish painting the barn door with a paint brush

timeline.label: 30 minutes from now
timeline.action: follow the farmer around until he notices me and the job I've done.

timeline.label: 4 hours from now
timeline.action: wield the paint brush and fresh red paint to finish painting the barn in front of a crowd of amazed soldiers.
